item.description:
For all you folk that have wanted to hit the gym 2X per week...here is your chance! Get in Day 2, get stronger, increase your indurance, and have a blast this Saturday!

I'll try to wear something exciting, my white-with-red-trim SUPERGIRL tanktop. And brown corduroy prana pants.

Meet us at the picnic tables by 6 PM.

If you arrive late, check the dry-erase board, where I'll post what I'm wearing. We may even opt for some bouldering!


...and now for the usual stuff...
Please note: you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take a class at Metrorock. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. Ladies get a 50% discount on Monday nights!

See http://www.metrorock.... for directions. You'll NEED them if this is your first time!

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.
item.how_to_find_us: White tanktop with red trim and SUPERGIRL "S" logo on the front
item.name: Get Your Butt to the Gym Saturday!
